title: GitLab security advisory (AV26-009)
description: On January 7, 2026, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.7.1, 18.6.3 and 18.5.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.7.1, 18.6.3 and 18.5.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
